detaileddescription.para: Configure TIME as a client only when the target system has multiple processors running separate instantiations of the cFE. One instantiation must be configured as the server and the remainder configured as clients. If the target system has only one processor running the cFE, then TIME must be configured as a server.
Enable one, and only one, of the following definitions in the platform configuration header file:
#CFE_TIME_CFG_SERVER, #CFE_TIME_CFG_CLIENT Next: Virtual MET Prev: Specifying Tone and Data Window Up To: Time Configuration
